description: When I try to click Sulfur, the app crashes. I tried to file a bug but gchemtable is not even listed in the component of Fedora.
Looks like it might be useful but it will not run on fedora28
summary: Would not recommend until they fix it

description:
Its a periodic table and it has got a lot of good info in their, perfect for something that just works.

The ability to view periodic trends is also much appreciated.
